alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 23 at 2:35PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .Ongoing snow melt will contribute to elevated river flows. For the East Walker River...including Strosnider Ditch Near Mason... minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and will continue. * WHERE...East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.5 feet, Flood Stage, minor flooding in reach. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM PDT Friday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM PDT Friday was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 9.0 feet. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: East Walker Road remains closed, use caution near river banks, prolonged high flows may lead to bank instability. There may also be debris within the river channel. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 400 PM PDT.
